definitions.definition: payment (as a tip or bribe) to expedite service

definitions.example_sentence: There was an algid  texture to the air, causing everyone to shiver involuntarily.

definitions.definition: the time of year when the sun is farthest north of the equator or farthest south of the equator
definitions.example_sentence: People all over the world have observed celebrations linked to the summer and winter solstices since ancient times.

definitions.definition: (of a person or mental process) Intelligently analytical and clear-thinking. Accurate and sharply focused
definitions.example_sentence: The incisive detective soon solved the crime.

definitions.definition: (of a subject or knowledge) Little known, obscure, abstruse
Obedient or attentive to an excessive degree
definitions.example_sentence: The obsequious service resulted in an excellent tip.

definitions.definition: (of language) Used in ordinary conversation; not formal or literary
definitions.example_sentence: His lecture was quite engaging due to his colloquial speech.

definitions.definition: Not honorable in character or purpose; shameful
